meanings.definition: Relating to or characterized by eosinophils.
meanings.sent1: The eosinophilic cells were easily identifiable under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the eosinophilic reaction in the patient's blood sample.
meanings.sent3: The eosinophilic cells threw a party in the bloodstream, painting it pink!
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was as vibrant and colorful as an eosinophilic stain.
meanings.sent5: The eosinophilic nature of the tissue made it stand out among the rest.

meanings.sent1: The eosinophilic tissue sample showed signs of inflammation.
meanings.sent2: The eosinophilic reaction in the body indicated an allergic response.
meanings.sent3: The eosinophilic cells in the body were like tiny detectives solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a canvas of colors, like an eosinophilic masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The eosinophilic presence in the sample was a clear indicator of an allergic reaction.
